thread.title: Mayor Bill de Blasio Unveils $88.67 Billion Budget Proposal

author: Mara Gay
title: Mayor Bill de Blasio Unveils $88.67 Billion Budget Proposal
text:
New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio laid out an $88.67 billion budget proposal Thursday, increasing spending amid uncertainty about how sweeping changes to the U.S. tax code could impact the city’s economy.
The plan would boost spending by $2.68 billion over this year’s adopted budget. Most of the increase would go toward the growing labor and pension costs from its large municipal workforce, as well as debt service, city officials said.
